page.title: 16AFTERTHOUGHTS
page.content: We asked people what they thought of this area: Most grown ups liked it because it is pretty but most young people said it was 'too boring' or had 'nothing to do'. A lot of the grown ups said they didn't want it to change because it was a quiet and beautiful place to live in.The Area Dev. Scheme agrees. We don't think it will change much around here because there probably won't be any factories and there's no oil or anything like that.There are less people living here than there were and a lot of them have to drive somewhere else to work.Farmers are still living and working in the area but most just live.One old person said it more lively when people worked where they lived.She said people were more together then.
